results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = A006789(k) if (n=k) otherwise zero. = (A006789 * 0^(n-k))
comment: Binomial transform of A153198 = triangle A153199 with row sums = A153197: (1, 2, 5, 15, 51, 189, 748,...).
formula: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = (A006789 * 0^(n-k)). Infinite lower triangular matrix with A006789: (1, 1, 2, 5, 14, 43, 143,...) as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
